## Cisco-IOS-XR-ip-rib-ipv6-oper.yang

- [XPaths Obsoleted](#xpaths-obsoleted)
- [XPaths Deprecated](#xpaths-deprecated)

### Description

reworked all RIB schemas to union IP addresses.

## XPaths Obsoleted

N/A

- (L1685)	/ipv6-rib-stdby
